channel.title: Pk points
channel.description: how do i work with pk points like if u got @@@ PK POINTS u can buy somthing inshop or somthing like u need 50 pk points to buy d claws from shop plz help .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2009, 09:58:03 am[/size][hr]plz

item.title: Pk points
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

[quote=“bbl111, post:5, topic:276773”][quote author=o.O O.o link=topic=365431.msg2772651#msg2772651 date=1241311103]
Tokens.
Example:

if(pkpoints >= 1000) { pkpoints -= 1000; sM("Thank you for buying this item."); }

Probably belongs with buying items from shops [;
[/quote]

Maybe tell him where to put it besides that ^^?[/quote]

Might as well come to his house and do it for him while I’m at it.

Read full topic
